* Iron Ramtor glared up at Nightstrike, keeping her splatter gun aimed at 
him as he moved.  She was disappointed that her shots hadn't hit, but she 
would make sure that the next ones did.*

" Who said anything about nice?"

* She spoke to herself as Nightstrike came in on her position in Aurora jet 
mode.  But she quickly realized that she had basically been hitting the 
wrong bee hive when s5 charges began to raid down on her.*

" Slag!"

*  She jumped out of the way, landing on her back and skidding a littl ways, 
shaking her head and feeling the heat from explosions where'd she has stood 
moments before.  But it wasn't pver yet!
With more charges coming she rolled, jumped and skidded to avoid them.  She 
was just about to stand when a charge she hadn't noticed exploded right in 
front of her, blowing her back to skid along the turned up soil. But on 
impact splitting pain shot up her arm as the lower part of it was blown 
apart, leaving a stump that gushed fluid.
She crouched on the ground, holding what was left of her arm to her side. 
But gritted her teeth and snapped her head up to glare at Nightstrike.
< He could finish me off like this!>*
